idea:
We have made a POC Device  "Temperature Monitoring and Control Device for Beverages with Machine Learning" to solve the following problem statements.


Problem Statements:

1. Hot beverages Coffee and tea beverages, in particular, are brewed at temperatures that are sufficiently high to cause immediate and serious risk for scald injuries.

2. Cold beverages, in particular, are brewed at temperatures that are sufficiently low to cause immediate and serious risk for dental sensitivity, weak digestion.
name: Kutir Devices

idea: Analah Insurance Broking Private Limited is a tech-enabled Insurance Broking platform headquartered in BKC, Mumbai. The Company received its Direct - Insurance Broking license from the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI), and the Company is involved in providing Insurance Broking Services through Direct and POS model. InsureDaq is a tech-based platform that allows individuals to select among the best insurance policies, suiting their risk mitigation goals. The Company will be providing the above services through a Direct and POS (Point of Sale) Model.
name: ANALAH INSURANCE BROKING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at ASEPSIS SERVICES PVT. LTD. are counted among the recognized entities, engaged in providing Security and Facility Management Services to our esteemed clientele. Under these categories we offer Security & tech Services, Housekeeping Services, Facility Management Services, Cleaning Services, Maintenance Services, Mechanical premises Services, tech services, Plumber, Electrician services, IT services, Civil/ Mechanical Services. We provide customize options of our services to attain the customers satisfaction.
